direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods relate to the capacity of the collection but provide different information (fullness vs. maximum size).
Both methods return an integer value related to the collection's state (current size vs. maximum size).
Both methods access the underlying collection to retrieve information.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializes the collection to be tested, ensuring it is bounded and unmodifiable.
Checks the fullness of the collection, which is a state dependency for maxSize.
Provides the current size of the collection, which can be used to assert the maxSize.
